thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Harbin Gong Da High-tech Enterprise Development says freeze of controlling shareholder' shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Harbin Gong Da High-tech Enterprise Development says freeze of controlling shareholder' shares

organizations.name: harbin gong da high-tech enterprise development co ltd
brief-harbin gong da high-tech enterprise development
chongqing city banan district people’s court

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Harbin Gong Da High-tech Enterprise Development Co Ltd
* Says 35.5 million shares (3.4 percent stake) held by controlling shareholder were frozen by Chongqing City Banan District People’s Court for loan disputes
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Si4Q7e
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
